title: first_name
description: The first name of the user, often used to address them directly, e.g., 'Diana' or 'John'.

title: last_name
description: The last name of the user, used to address them more formally or as part of their full name.

title: edu_level
description: The education level of the user, represented by a number (1 for Primary School, 2 for Middle School, 3 for High School, etc.).

title: current_role
description: The current occupation or role of the user, indicating their professional or educational status, e.g., 'Data Scientist', 'Student'.
